code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NewTransactionForm=_ref=>{let{onSubmit}=_ref;const[formData,setFormData]=useState({date:'',description:'',category:'',amount:''});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData(prevState=>({...prevState,[name]:value}));};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onSubmit(formData);setFormData({date:'',description:'',category:'',amount:''});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",name:"date",value:formData.date,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"description",placeholder:"Description",value:formData.description,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"category",placeholder:"Category",value:formData.category,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"amount",placeholder:"Amount",value:formData.amount,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Transaction"})]});};export default NewTransactionForm;
